long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Tab Grouper is a powerful and intuitive extension that helps you keep your browsing sessions organized and efficient. With just one click, you can group all the tabs in your current window into a single group, reducing clutter and improving your workflow. But that's not all - with Tab Grouper, you can also ungroup your tabs just as easily, allowing you to quickly and effortlessly switch between different sets of tabs. Simplify your browsing experience and take control of your tabs with Tab Grouper today!"
